headline: Don't Try to Time the Market: These 2 Stocks Are Buys Regardless of What Happens Next
summary: Equity markets have been seesawing for the past two weeks.  Stocks fell hard after President Donald Trump announced his tariff plans, then bounced back big once he said he would pause expanded tariffs on imported goods from most countries for 90 days.  It's hard to predict which way major indexes will move next, but amid all this volatility, it helps to buy shares of companies that are likely to perform well in the long run.
